explains: v. 轻描淡写；避重就轻地说；不充分陈述

sentences.en: It would be a mistake to understate the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 对该问题的严重性轻描淡写是错误的。

sentences.en: The government chooses deliberately to understate the increase in prices.
sentences.cn: 政府有意选择对价格的上涨轻描淡写。

sentences.en: These figures may understate actual price declines.
sentences.cn: 这些数字可能低估实际价格的下跌。
